Processing Speed refers to how quickly y.ENGLISH: Processing Speed refers to how quickly your brain can understand and react to information.
Processing Speed refers to how quickly y.MANDARIN: 处理速度是指您的大脑理解和反应信息的速度。
Processing Speed refers to how quickly y.BAHASA: Kecepatan Pemrosesan mengacu pada seberapa cepat otak Anda dapat memahami dan bereaksi terhadap informasi.
Processing Speed refers to how quickly y.MALAY: Kelajuan Pemprosesan merujuk kepada seberapa cepat otak anda boleh memahami dan bertindak balas terhadap maklumat.
Processing Speed refers to how quickly y.TAGALOG: Ang Bilis ng Pagproseso ay tumutukoy sa kung gaano kabilis maintindihan at tumugon ang iyong utak sa impormasyon.
Processing Speed refers to how quickly y.MALAYALAM: പ്രോസസ്സിംഗ് വേഗത എന്നത് നിങ്ങളുടെ മസ്തിഷ്കത്തിന് എത്ര വേഗത്തിൽ വിവരങ്ങൾ മനസ്സിലാക്കാനും പ്രതികരിക്കാനും കഴിയും എന്നതിനെ സൂചിപ്പിക്കുന്നു.

Match as many symbols to their numbers.ENGLISH: Match as many symbols to their numbers  as possible within 1 minute.
Match as many symbols to their numbers.MANDARIN: 在1分钟内尽可能多地将符号与其数字匹配。
Match as many symbols to their numbers.BAHASA: Cocokkan sebanyak mungkin simbol dengan angkanya dalam 1 menit.
Match as many symbols to their numbers.MALAY: Padankan sebanyak mungkin simbol dengan nombor mereka dalam 1 minit.
Match as many symbols to their numbers.TAGALOG: Itugma ang maraming simbolo sa kanilang mga numero hangga't maaari sa loob ng 1 minuto.
Match as many symbols to their numbers.MALAYALAM: 1 മിനിറ്റിനുള്ളിൽ കഴിയുന്നത്ര ചിഹ്നങ്ങളെ അവയുടെ സംഖ്യകളുമായി പൊരുത്തപ്പെടുത്തുക.

Focus on the symbol at the top of the sc.ENGLISH: Focus on the symbol at the top of the screen.
Focus on the symbol at the top of the sc.MANDARIN: 专注于屏幕顶部的符号。
Focus on the symbol at the top of the sc.BAHASA: Fokus pada simbol di bagian atas layar.
Focus on the symbol at the top of the sc.MALAY: Fokus pada simbol di bahagian atas skrin.
Focus on the symbol at the top of the sc.TAGALOG: Tumuon sa simbolo sa itaas ng screen.

Look for the matching symbol and its num.ENGLISH: Look for the matching symbol and its number. Here, it is 6.
Look for the matching symbol and its num.MANDARIN: 寻找匹配的符号及其数字。在这里，是6。
Look for the matching symbol and its num.BAHASA: Here, it is 6.: Cari simbol yang cocok dan angkanya. Di sini, itu adalah 6.
Look for the matching symbol and its num.MALAY: Cari simbol yang sepadan dan nombornya. Di sini, ia adalah 6.
Look for the matching symbol and its num.TAGALOG: Hanapin ang tugmang simbolo at ang numero nito. Dito, ito ay 6.
Look for the matching symbol and its num.MALAYALAM: പൊരുത്തപ്പെടുന്ന ചിഹ്നവും അതിന്റെ നമ്പറും തിരയുക. ഇവിടെ, അത് 6 ആണ്.

Tap “6” in the number pad below..ENGLISH: Tap “6” in the number pad below.
Tap “6” in the number pad below..MANDARIN: 点击下方数字键盘中的"6"。
Tap “6” in the number pad below..BAHASA: Ketuk "6" di papan angka di bawah.
Tap “6” in the number pad below..MALAY: Ketik "6" dalam pad nombor di bawah.
Tap “6” in the number pad below..TAGALOG: I-tap ang "6" sa number pad sa ibaba.

Be careful, the order of the symbols wil.ENGLISH: Be careful, the order of the symbols will change after every turn.
Be careful, the order of the symbols wil.MANDARIN: 请注意，符号的顺序在每轮后都会改变。
Be careful, the order of the symbols wil.BAHASA: Hati-hati, urutan simbol akan berubah setelah setiap giliran.
Be careful, the order of the symbols wil.MALAY: Berhati-hati, susunan simbol akan berubah selepas setiap giliran.
Be careful, the order of the symbols wil.TAGALOG: Mag-ingat, ang pagkakasunod-sunod ng mga simbolo ay magbabago pagkatapos ng bawat turn.
Be careful, the order of the symbols wil.MALAYALAM: ശ്രദ്ധിക്കുക, ഓരോ തവണയ്ക്കും ശേഷം ചിഹ്നങ്ങളുടെ ക്രമം മാറും.

Now try out the next 3 rounds by yoursel.ENGLISH: Now try out the next 3 rounds by yourself!
Now try out the next 3 rounds by yoursel.MANDARIN: 现在自己尝试接下来的3轮！
Now try out the next 3 rounds by yoursel.TAGALOG: Ngayon subukan ang susunod na 3 rounds mag-isa!
